meanings.sent1: The humorless teacher never laughed at jokes in class.
meanings.sent2: She found his humorless response to be quite dull.
meanings.sent3: Despite his humorless nature, he accidentally made everyone chuckle with his serious face.
meanings.sent4: Her humorless demeanor cast a shadow over the otherwise cheerful gathering.
meanings.sent5: The room felt humorless, like a deflated balloon at a party.

meanings.definition: Not able to appreciate or understand humor
meanings.sent1: The humorless man failed to see the funny side of the situation.
meanings.sent2: She felt sorry for her humorless friend who missed all the jokes.
meanings.sent3: His humorless reaction to the prank left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The humorless atmosphere in the room was palpable, stifling any laughter.
meanings.sent5: The party became humorless when the comedian failed to entertain the crowd.
